Title: Directs the chief administrative judge of the New York unified court system to conduct a study on the office of court administration's housing court guardian ad litem program
Summary: Directs the chief administrative judge of the New York unified court system to conduct a study on the office of court administration's housing court guardian ad litem program and to publish a report on such study.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the chief administrative judge of the New York unified court system to conduct a study on the office of court administration's housing court guardian ad litem program
